entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon and ending later this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
